showWindOverrideSwitch.title: Show Wind Override Switch
showWindOverrideSwitch.description: This option hasn't been implemented yet; override switch will always show.

id.title: Group ID
id.description: A unique ID that won't change. [Help](https://github.com/shaungrady/homebridge-security-floodlights/wiki/1.-Configuration#group-id)

motionSensorCount.title: Motion Sensor Switch Count
motionSensorCount.description: Number of sensors participating in triggering this group's lights. [Help](https://github.com/shaungrady/homebridge-security-floodlights/wiki/1.-Configuration#group-id)

occupancyTimeoutSeconds.title: Occupancy Inactivity Delay (seconds)
occupancyTimeoutSeconds.description: How long before lights turn off after no motion. [Help](https://github.com/shaungrady/homebridge-security-floodlights/wiki/1.-Configuration#occupancy-inactivity-delay-seconds)
occupancyTimeoutSeconds.placeholder: Seconds before occupancy sensor shows 'no occupancy.'
